title: Bug 102623Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: Description: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.Steps to reproduce:1. Import an image named "image1.jpg" into layout view.2. Delete this image file from outlineimage.3. Rename "image2.jpg" as "image1.jpg".4. Import new "image1.jpg" into layout again.Expected result: New image is displayed.Actual result: Original image is still displayed.
